long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture, Edit, and Share Stunning Screenshots with Ease.

How It Works
	1.	Capture: Use the extension to take a screenshot effortlessly.
	2.	Edit: The editor opens instantly, allowing you to enhance your screenshot.
	3.	Enhance: Apply various tools and effects to make your screenshot look amazing.
	4.	Share: Download your polished screenshot and share it with the world.

It’s that simple!

-- Shortcuts --

MacOS

	•	Start Screenshot: Cmd + Shift + S
	•	Capture Screenshot: Cmd + C
	•	Cancel Screenshot: Esc

Windows

	•	Start Screenshot: Ctrl + Shift + S
	•	Capture Screenshot: Ctrl + C
	•	Cancel Screenshot: Esc
